ygData.subject: Re: Lambent bits and pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: I am pretty sure that I got mine in the bar room in Sol-A.  We were there about 4 hours and I got both items.  We had some mid 30 s rangers with us lower
ygData.messageBody:
I am pretty sure that I got mine in the "bar room" in Sol-A. We were there
about 4 hours and I got both items. We had some mid 30's rangers with us
lower 30's. When my regular group tried to break the room at levels 24 thru
28 group, we got spanked. If you can recruit some mid 30's types you should
do pretty well.

Sylly

> From: Melaniel <everquest@...>
>

> Can anyone gimme a few hints about where and how tough the Solusek
> Mage and the Solusek Champion are. An opinion of how frequent the
> spawn and drops are would be helpful too ;-)
